graph_title: 국가위험감축전략에 따라 지역재난위험감축전략을 채택하고 시행하는 지자체의 비율
indicator_name: 국가의 재난위험감축전략에 따라 지자체 차원에서 전략을 갖추고 있는 비율
target_name: 2020년까지 포용, 자원 효율, 기후 변화에 대한 완화와 적응, 재난에 대한 회복력을 위한 통합 정책 및 계획을 채택, 시행하는 도시와 거주지의 수를 대폭 확대하고, 2015-2030년 재난위험감소를 위한 센다이 프레임워크에 맞추어 모든 수준에서의 통합적인 재난위기관리를 구축하고 시행함

en.target: By 2020, substantially increase the number of cities and human settlements adopting and implementing integrated policies and plans towards inclusion, resource efficiency, mitigation and adaptation to climate change, resilience to disasters, and develop and implement, in line with the Sendai Framework for Disaster Risk Reduction 2015-2030, holistic disaster risk management at all levels
en.title: Proportion of local governments that adopt and implement local disaster risk reduction strategies in line with national disaster risk reduction strategies
en.indicator_name: Proportion of local governments that adopt and implement local disaster risk reduction strategies in line with national disaster risk reduction strategies
en.un_custodian_agency: United Nations International Strategy for Disaster Reduction (UNISDR)
en.goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 217 KB)
en.graph_title: Proportion of local governments that adopt and implement local disaster risk reduction strategies in line with national disaster risk reduction strategies
en.page_content: ▶ Data type: Estimated data by international organizations (Type2) This is Korean data prepared by international organizations through estimation and modeling. If there are no national data corresponding to UN SDGs indicators, international data are available for monitoring.
